short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus on the content; as little or as much as you'd like.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension acts as a digital reading ruler. It allows you to stay focused by blocking distractions while reading online.

Logo by: Ricardo Moreira (https://thenounproject.com/skatakila/)
